modules.description: Calculates the modulus of an integer. Operates on integer values to compute the remainder after division. Used to determine cyclical behavior in numerical sequences.

Performs modular addition, subtraction, multiplication, and exponentiation with support for negative numbers. Operates on integers and returns results within the specified modulus range. Used to implement cryptographic hash functions and cyclic group operations.

Performs modular arithmetic operations, including modulus calculation with a fixed integer. Works with integers and modular residue representations. Used to enforce value constraints within a fixed range, such as in cyclic algorithms or clock arithmetic.
